Class NotesProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ContentProvider
      • com.example.stanza.NotesProvider

  • public class NotesProvider
extends ContentProvider
    A class for retrieving the notes from our table in the database

      • query

        public Cursor query(Uri uri,
                    java.lang.String[] projection,
                    java.lang.String selection,
                    java.lang.String[] selectionArgs,
                    java.lang.String sortOrder)
        Allows for dynamic access to the database based on cursor position.
        Parameters:
        uri - identifies the table.
        projection - The columns of the database we would like returned
        selection - The selection clause of the query
        selectionArgs - The selection arguments of the query
        sortOrder - How we want the return to be sorted
        Returns:
        The database query results

        Parameters:
        uri - identifies the table
        Returns:
        null

        public int delete(Uri uri,
                  java.lang.String selection,
                  java.lang.String[] selectionArgs)
        Delete elements from the table
        Parameters:
        uri - the table identifier
        selection - The selected element(s) to delete
        selectionArgs - Arguments wanted in the deletion process
        Returns:
        The database with the deleted element(s)

      • update

        public int update(Uri uri,
                  ContentValues values,
                  java.lang.String selection,
                  java.lang.String[] selectionArgs)
        Updates the table after some change
        Parameters:
        uri - The table identifier
        values - The values to be updated into the table.
        selection - The selection to be updated.
        selectionArgs - Possible args that change how we update.
        Returns:
        the database after the update operation.
